game.name: Dude Simulator 5
game.shortDescription: Dude Simulator 5 is an open world sandbox game. Your goal is to become president! However, it will not be so easy to do this, which means that many adventures await you on your way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dude Simulator 5 is an open world sandbox game. Your goal is to become president! However, it will not be so easy to do this, which means that many adventures await you on your way.

reviewHighlights.text: Better than the 4th game Worse than the 3rd game Its very short I would only recommend for dude simulator fans 6/10
These games are already not super serious so i can't complain for much of the content, but the game is pitifully short. Finished it in 46 minutes. Not...
